mapper.select: select TRANSACTIONID, ORDERID, CUSTOMERID, EBAYITEMID, EBAYITEMNAME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, PRECASETIME, OPERTIME, ANSWER, UPDATEFLAG, UPDATEDESCR, SHOPTYPE, SHOPTYPEID, SELLUSERID, EXPRESSID, EXPRESSTYPE, TRACKURL, GROUPID, CHECKINFO, CHECKFLAG, UPDATETIME, OPER from DB_INRCASE where TRANSACTIONID = #{transactionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
